short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Efficiently organize and manage browser tabs with session grouping and quick search features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control of your browsing experience with TabFlow, a powerful and intuitive tab management extension designed to streamline your workflow. Whether you're juggling research tabs, managing work sessions, or just trying to stay organized, TabFlow has the tools you need.
